item.title: Redis on Flash (RoF) quick start
item.description: This page guides you through a quick setup of a Redis on Flash cluster with a single node for testing and demo purposes. For production environments, you can find more detailed installation instructions in the install and setup section. The steps to set up a Redis Enterprise Software cluster using Redis on Flash with a single node are: Install Redis Enterprise Software or run it in a Docker container. Set up a Redis Enterprise Software cluster withÂ Redis on Flash.
